title: Best of The Herd for Mar 02, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 02, 2020
description:
The Cowboys putting the franchise tag on Dak makes sense

LeBron James is the NBA MVP

Zion has the unique traits that make a superstar

Colin admits where he was right and wrong over the last week

Guest: T. J. Houshmandzadeh, form NFL WR says Tom Brady is not going back to the Patriots
